(JP, the shields thing I had brought up a few days ago, and Yan said he'd 
check.  He didn't reply. Then today after he told me about the sub, I brought 
it up again and it didn't go to the bottom of the floor, etc.  The shields 
modifications will be what should've been done with common sense.

As for the torpedoes and mines, that was after we heard of the sub.  But 
those are all necessary precautions.

Finally, the Alliance Base was put into several different pieces and carried 
off by shuttle.  It didn't move, and it wasn't intact when it did so.  Yan 
and my problem with the mobile base rule is if you make the base into a sub.  
I mean a sub the SIZE of BA's base.  Using the base for scrap parts is 
another thing.  But a sub as big as BA's base, we'd have to be crazy to say 
it wasn't a mobile base!)


Lord Unitron
KSLawDogg@...
